title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Techno-economic analysis on choice of stoping methods, high productivity methods: blasthole stoping, vertical retreat method of mining, block caving, raise stoping, underground bench blasting, step mining methods, special underground excavations: ore transfer raises, ramp, decline, stope design and production planning, methods of pillar extraction, hot muck mining, solution mining: in situ leaching, underground retorting, under-sea mining, introduction to novel mining methods, Application of nuclear blasting in underground mining.
